thread.title: Kheper Games, Inc. Announces '40 Reasons to Party,' Other Games
thread.title_full: Kheper Games, Inc. Announces '40 Reasons to Party,' Other Games

author: Adriana Gomez-Weston
title: Kheper Games, Inc. Announces '40 Reasons to Party,' Other Games
text:
SEATTLE—Kheper Games, Inc. has announced 40 Reasons to Party and 40 Reasons to Have Sex as two new games joining its extensive line of award-winning adult games. Each set includes 40 cards and a stand to display the activity, the person selecting the card, wants to act out.
40 Reasons to Party is a set of 40 illustrated cards that give players fun reasons and ideas on how to party. When players feel like having some fun, they can select a card and display it for their friends. Then carry out the instructions or drinking game rules. Example cards include “Because the wine won’t drink itself. Go wine tasting!” and “Someone offered you a penny for your thoughts, and you said you’d rather play quarters.”
40 Reasons to Have Sex is a set of 40 sexy cards that give players funny reasons and ideas on how to have great sex. Plays can select a card, display it for a lover, and follow the position until they're ready for a second card or orgasms. Example reasons on the cards include “You’re tired of feeling tied down, and would rather be tied up.” And “Because he said ‘Can you please help with the groceries?’ and you heard ‘Get on your knees bitch!’”
Both sets are being launched with 11 other new products at ANME and the 40 Reasons to Party set will be available to sample in the break room at the Vibe show.
“We are excited to offer something new to the adult games market,” explained CEO Brian Pellham. “We are already getting great feedback for how cute the sets are and how funny the cards are as well. Whether hanging out with good friends or trying something fun with a lover, it’s important and always helps to start with a good laugh!”
40 Reasons to Party joins Kheper Games, Inc.’s line of party games, including Extreme Personal Questions, Making Bad Situations Worse, The World’s Most Ridiculous Drinking Games, the full family of What the F*ck? games, THC, Potheads Against Sanity, Think Like a Stoner, and more.
40 Reasons to Have Sex joins Kheper Games, Inc.’s massive list of romance and sex games including Date Nights, Sex!!!, Mind, Body & Soul, Sex!, Lust!, Let’s Fool Around, Let’s F*ck!, Fantasy Affairs, Intimacy, Sex! Card Games, Go F*ck!, Good Times Here We Cum!, Bedroom Commands, 1000 Sex Games, 4Play, Hedonism, Creative Kisses, Seductions Kits, and more.
For more details on the adult party and relationship games by Kheper Games, contact
[[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#86efe8e0e9c6edeee3f6e3f4e1e7ebe3f5a8e5e9eb), or visit [khepergames.com].
